name: Chinese Fish Congee
author: xiaoyangju
summary: Congee, or rice porridge, is a popular dish in many Asian countries, particularly when you are feeling under the weather. This authentic Chinese congee uses white fish and just a few other simple ingredients.
ingredients: 5 ounces white fish, cut into small chunks
1 (3 inch) piece fresh ginger root, thinly sliced
½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
directions: Combine water and rice in a large pot over high heat
Bring to a boil; simmer for 5 minutes
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until rice is tender, about 30 minutes
Combine fish, ginger, spring onion, chicken bouillon granules, and pepper in a bowl
Stir fish mixture into the pot
Simmer gently until rice is very soft and fish is falling apart, about 20 minutes
